features.name: Private Balcony
features.description: Expansive outdoor terrace offering unobstructed views and comfortable seating

features.name: Antique Canopy Bed
features.description: Carved, illuminated structure featuring ornate details and intricate mandala accents

features.name: En-suite Bathroom
features.description: Modern bath area featuring a vanity, dual storage units, a refreshing shower, and a separate toilet

features.name: Outdoor Bathtub
features.description: Freestanding tub located on a secondary terrace for serene relaxation

features.name: Daybed & Office
features.description: Versatile space offering a relaxed lounge and a formal desk setup with ergonomic seating

features.name: Entertainment & Security
features.description: Featuring Sonos speakers (built-in and portable), a charging hub with integrated cables, and a safe storage compartment
